children.name: Control flow complexity
children.description: The computational complexity of the control flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: Data flow complexity
children.description: The complexity of the data flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: OO complexity
children.description: The complexity of the object-oriented architecture and structure. Composed of MDIT (maximum depth of inheritance tree).

children.name: Code documentation
children.description: The amount of documentation in the code: comment rate, javadoc, etc.

children.name: Code size
children.description: The overall size of the code.

children.name: Access points
children.description: The amount of attributes and methods on the class, whatever their visibility is.

children.name: Public access points
children.description: Total number of public classes, interfaces, methods, constructors, annotations and attributes.

children.name: SCM Documentation
children.description: Is there some documentation about the SCM process, rules and conventions?

children.name: ITS usage
children.description: How much the ITS system was used during last month. Composed of ITS_ISSUES_OPEN_1M and ITS_ISSUES_OPENERS_1M.

children.name: SCM usage
children.description: How much the SCM system was used during last month. Composed of SCM_COMMITS_1M and SCM_COMMITTERS_1M.
